item.title: How to Use Github Copilot for Free
item.description: Github Copilot is an AI-powered code completion tool that helps developers write code faster and more efficiently. It can be used with a variety of programming languages and editors. In this tutorial, we’ll show you how to use Github Copilot for free. Step 1: Sign Up for Github Copilot The first step to using Github Copilot is to sign up for the service. You can do this by going to the Github Copilot website and creating an account.
